ARTICLE.TITLE: Don't get 'casual' about COVID, Ontario's top doctor warns amid resort outbreak
ARTICLE.TEXT: Ontario Premier Doug Ford makes an announcement in Beamsville, Ont., on Tuesday, August 4, 2020. Premier Doug Ford will meet with local leaders in Windsor-Essex today after the region entered Stage 3 of the province's reopening plan on Wednesday. THE CANADIAN PRESS/Tara Walton

METADATA.keywords: ontario, economy, health, agriculture, politics, david williams, medicine, christine elliott, toronto, outbreak, deerhurst resort, ford motor company
METADATA.news_keywords: ontario, economy, health, agriculture, politics, david williams, medicine, christine elliott, toronto, outbreak, deerhurst resort, ford motor company
METADATA.description: TORONTO - A COVID-19 outbreak at an Ontario resort earlier this month was the result of people getting "casual" with public health guidelines, the province's top doctor said Thursday.
METADATA.author: Shawn Jeffords The Canadian Press

og.title: Don't get 'casual' about COVID, Ontario's top doctor warns amid resort outbreak
